channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: What’s Your Client’s Optimal Equity Allocation?
item.description: Note to investment advisors: You may be overestimating the risks of equities for conservative investors with longer investment horizons.

item.title: Former Tesla board member says he wouldn’t vote for Musk’s $56 billion pay package
item.description: This is “hubris,” said the former audit chairman and VC.

item.title: Gold and Inflation: An Unstable Relationship
item.description: While there are periods when gold has hedged inflation quite well, beware blanket claims of gold's inflation-hedging utility.

item.title: Tesla board chair says not paying Elon Musk is unfair—‘Put yourself in his shoes’
item.description: Investors will vote on the Tesla CEO’s $56 billion stock option package next week.

item.title: Monetary Policy and Financial Conditions: Meaningful Relationship?
item.description: An analysis of the Fed's recent rounds of quantitative tightening (QT) and quantitative easing (QE) yields actionable insights about the relationship between monetary policy and financial conditions.

item.title: Tokyo’s government plays matchmaker with new dating app to reverse its plunging birth rate
item.description: The app will have strict prerequisites to help fight scams and misrepresentation.

item.title: Five Quotes from Financial History to Guide Trustees
item.description: If you serve as a trustee of an institutional investment plan, these five quotes may help guide your decisions for the benefit of those who depend on your stewardship.

item.title: Teacher absences are worse now than during the pandemic. It’s costing schools $4 billion a year and some students ‘will never get back on track’
item.description: Teachers say absences are a symptom of more student behavioral issues, fewer resources, and low salaries eaten away by inflation.

item.title: Stocks for the Long Run? Setting the Record Straight
item.description: Stocks are a good investment long-term, providing that you dial in your expectations. New historical findings provide a richer, more complete understanding of international returns.

item.title: Robinhood defies the SEC by forking over $200 million for a crypto exchange
item.description: The company, which received a Wells Notice from the SEC in May, touted the move as “a major step in growing our crypto business.”
